title: ISic002922. Epitaph for Laurentius, a doctor, and his wife Prosdocia
body:
Facsimile Images

((cross_uninterpreted)) Memoria Laurenti
medici et ussor eius
Prosdocia

Apparatus criticus

Text of Korhonen 2010

English translation

In memory of Laurentius the doctor and his wife Prosocia
